Hi,

I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the current test method,
when you are in setUp() or tearDown()?


Usage :


    public void tearDown()
	{
        System.out.println ("You have just executed : " +
<method_name_comes_here> ) ;
        printSomeInfoHere () ;
      }
